name: nuwa
description: Wechaty is a Bot Framework for Wechat **Personal** Account which can help you create a bot in 6 lines of javascript by easy to use API, with cross-platform support include [Linux](https://travis-ci.org/wechaty/wechaty), [Windows](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/wechaty/wechaty), [Darwin(OSX/Mac)](https://travis-ci.org/wechaty/wechaty) and [Docker](https://circleci.com/gh/wechaty/wechaty).
